name: shorts-deflector
description: Seamlessly play YouTube Shorts with the normal desktop interface.
author: Attituding <attituding@outlook.com>

scripts.build: npm run typescript && npm run tailwind
scripts.assets: del src/vendors/chromium/assets /q && xcopy src/assets src/vendors/chromium/assets /S /Y /I && del src/vendors/firefox/assets /q && xcopy src/assets src/vendors/firefox/assets /S /Y /I
scripts.zip: powershell New-Item src\dist -force -type directory && powershell Compress-Archive src\vendors\chromium\* src\dist\chromium.zip -Force && powershell Compress-Archive src\vendors\firefox\* src\dist\firefox.zip -Force
